document_data.name: Clan Licehair
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Licehair''' was a minor [[Dwarf|dwarven]] clan that inhabited [[Faer√ªn]] and neighbored [[Clan Stonehand]] sometime before [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: Clan Licehair was known for the attention its bachelorettes gave to the young warriors of Clan Stonehand, following their defeat of the [[black dragon]] [[Zarkursk]] and inheriting its massive [[gem]] hoard. The Clan Licehair women's attempts to marry the Clan Stonehand warriors was so unwanted that [[Kurgin Stonehand]], the leader of Clan Stonehand commissioned the creation of ''[[Dwarven belt of charming|dwarven belts of charming]]'' to make the young warriors unappealing even by low dwarfish standards.
